title: Contact us- Phone, Email, Mail
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Verify- Contact us- Phone, Email, Mail
custom_steps:
WHEN

Verify these links:

- By Phone
- By Email
- By Mail
custom_expected:
THEN

- 'By Phone' should bring up native phone app (e.g Facetime, Zoom etc)
- 'By Email' should bring up native mail client
- 'By Mail' shouldn't do anything

title: Contact us- Verify these Customer Support links:
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Verify these Customer Support links:
custom_steps:
WHEN

- Online sponsorship
- Ticketing
- General Site Enquiries
custom_expected:
THEN

Upon clicking/tapping on these links the email client should open up with the appropriate email address pre-filled

title: Contact us- Verify these General information links:
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Verify these General information links:
custom_steps:
WHEN

- Milb.TV
- Tickets
- Mobile Apps
- Fans
- Shop
- Auctions
custom_expected:
THEN

Upon clicking/ tapping user should be navigated to the appropriate pages

title: Ellipsis dropdown menu (Dynamic based on screen size)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Ellipsis dropdown menu
custom_steps:
WHEN

- Hover over the three dot ellipsis bar to see the dropdown menu
- Make sure all these links are visible and clickable:

Tickets
Shop
About
Events
Fans
First Pitch app
Gameday Audio
Podcast
Teams
custom_expected:
THEN

- Hovering over the tab should show the dropdown menu

title: Teams (Top Nav)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on milb homepage and

User wants to go to the Teams page
custom_steps: WHEN the user Clicks tap on 'Teams' link
custom_expected: THEN the User should be navigated to https://www.milb.com/about/teams

title: MILB.TV (Top Nav)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on Milb HomePage
custom_steps: WHEN the user Clicks on MLB.TV link from header
custom_expected: THEN the User should be navigated to https://www.milb.com/live-stream-games/subscribe

title: Search (Top nav)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User wants to Search a word/topic within MILB.COM
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Tap/click on Search icon
2. Tap/click on the X button
3. Type in Search box
4. Select any of the matches
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Search box appears with X button
2. Search box closes
3. - If no matches are there then nothing is showing or suggesting
   - If there is a match, results show in a drop down list
4. User is navigated to the appropriate page

Home page hero image/article

custom_expected:

2. User is navigated to the News page with the article on it within the same browser tab

GIVEN

User wants to see what is under Top Prospects section
custom_steps:

2. Verify players' profile pictures clickable
custom_expected:

title: Ben's Biz
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User wants to navigate to Ben's Biz section
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Verify there is a 'Ben's Biz' tile with image links and CTAs 
2. Verify the images and articles are clickable
3. Verify there is 'More on Ben's Biz link at the bottom of the tile
3. Verify 'More on 'More on Ben's Biz' is clickable
custom_expected:
THEN

1. User is navigated to the appropriate  pages within the same browser tab

title: Leaders
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User wants to explore Leaders section
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Verify there is a 'Leaders' tile at the lower right rail of the page
2. Verify the tile has a drop down for different divisions and they are selectable
3. Verify there are separate column for 'Batting' and 'Pitching'
4. Verify selecting difference divisions from the drop down dynamically changes the information under the two separate columns
5. Verify players' names are clickable
custom_expected:
THEN

1. User can dynamically see different players as they choose a different divisions from the drop down
2. User can click/tap on the players and navigated to detail pages

title: Trending on MILB.com
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User wants to see what is under Trending on MILB.com section
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Verify there is a 'Trending on Milb.com' tile with images, CTAs and links
2. Verify user can click/tap on these images, CTAs and links
custom_expected:
THEN

1. User is navigated to the appropriate pages within the same tab
2. Twitter links should open up new tabs

custom_expected:

title: Verify that clicking on the account icon will present user with a “Sign In” Page.
Verify that clicking on the Sign Up link presents the user with a “Register” Page.
Verify that the email field can accept a valid email address.
Verify that the email field presents an error if the text entered is not a valid email address.
Verify that the Password field accepts a password in the specified format.
Verify that the Password field presents an error if the password in not the specified format.
Verify that if Passwords do not match an error is presented.
Verify that the Date of Birth dropdowns work as expected.
Verify that the “I would like to receive commercial e-mails from MiLB.com and their partners” checkbox works properly.
Verify that after all field are correctly entered clicking on the Register button creates a new account.
Verify that you cannot register an account that already exists.
Verify that clicking on the account icon will present user with a “Sign In” Page.
Verify that text can be entered in the Username field.
Verify that the Password field accepts a password in the specified format.
Verify if the credentials do not match those created in the Registration section “Unable to sign in” will be displayed.
Verify that “Remember me” checkbox works correctly.
Verify with proper credentials the user can properly sign in.
Verify that after being signed in the user can select the account icon-edit link and get redirected to https://www.mlb.com/account
Verify that clicking the “Need help signing in?” link expands options below.
Verify clicking “Forgot Password?” redirects to https://www.milb.com/forgot-password.
Verify user can enter an email address and receive a reset password link in the “Forget Password” text field.
Verify user receives a reset password link and can successfully reset password.
Verify clicking “Terms of Use” redirects to https://www.milb.com/about/terms-of-use.
Verify clicking “Privacy Policy” redirects to https://www.milb.com/about/privacy-policy.
Verify clicking “Help” redirects to https://www.milb.com/about/contact-us.
Verify “Log out” link exists below Account icon.
Verify user is logged out after clicking “Log out” link
Verify after user is logged out clicking on the Account icon will present user with the Login screen.
Verify that the Tickets button next to each team navigates to the correct team ticket pages.
custom_steps:
Navigate to https://www.milb.com/tickets
Within the State/Province dropdown, enable only one state.
Click the Apply button.
Scroll to the teams listed below the Tickets map, select a team and click "Tickets".
custom_expected: Clicking a Tickets button correctly navigates to the appropriate Team's ticket page.

title: Verify that the Tickets map correctly displays the teams listed.
custom_steps:
Navigate to https://www.milb.com/tickets
Within the State/Province dropdown, enable only one state.
Click the Apply button.
custom_expected:
Verify that the Tickets map is focused on the state selected.
*Run several permutations, creating different filter criteria and verifying the map accurately reflects the teams selected.

title: Verify that the Tickets Map can zoom in and out.
custom_steps:
Navigate to https://www.milb.com/tickets
Within the League dropdown, enable several leagues.
Click the Apply button.
Click the zoom in button within the map.
Click the zoom out button within the map.
custom_expected: The Tickets map can be zoomed in and zoomed out.

title: Verify that the user can filter by year(default 2019).
custom_preconds:
Player pages exist in the URL format https://www.milb.com/player/player-name-number. 
For example https://www.milb.com/player/travis-d-arnaud-518595.
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to https://www.milb.com/player/
2. See the Roster search dropdowns at the top of the page. 
3. Attempt to filter by year.
custom_expected: Teams listed in the Teams dropdown accurately reflect the year that was selected.

title: Verify that the user can filter by team(based on year).
custom_preconds:
Player pages exist in the URL format https://www.milb.com/player/player-name-number.
For example https://www.milb.com/player/travis-d-arnaud-518595.
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to https://www.milb.com/player/
2. See the Roster search dropdowns at the top of the page.
3. Attempt to filter by team.
custom_expected: Selecting a team in the dropdown populates the player dropdown with the roster of the selected team.

title: Verify that the user can filter by player(based on team).

Player pages exist in the URL format https://www.milb.com/player/player-name-number.
For example https://www.milb.com/player/travis-d-arnaud-518595.
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to https://www.milb.com/player/
2. See the Roster search dropdowns at the top of the page.
3. Attempt to filter by player.
custom_expected: Selecting a player in the dropdown brings you to the correct player page.

title: Verify that the player selected appears on page.
custom_preconds:
Player pages exist in the URL format https://www.milb.com/player/player-name-number.
For example https://www.milb.com/player/travis-d-arnaud-518595.

1. Navigate to https://www.milb.com/player/
2. See the Roster search dropdowns at the top of the page.
3. Select a player in the player dropdown.
custom_expected: User is brought to the correct player page.

title: Verify that the Standing heading exists.
Verify that four (4) dropdowns appear (year, league, season, and league) and that the Standings table can be filtered based on the values selected.
Verify that dropdowns operate from left to right: making a selection from a filter on the left changes the available options in the filter to the right of it.
Verify that in the year filter the values range from 2021 - 2005 (descending) and that 2020 is not included in the list.
Verify that selecting 2021 offers a different set of values in the league field when compared to all other years.
Verify that two buttons,Standard and Advanced, appear on the same row/line as the dropdowns.
Verify that within the team column each team has a team logo, and the full name of the club.
Verify that clicking on a team name brings the user to the team homepage.
Verify Font displayed on site should be Lato.
Verify that column separator placement for the columns on table (between WCGB and L10, STRK and RS, XW/L and HOME, >.500 and NEXT GAME)
Verify Line item for Last Updated is displayed.
Verify that the Next Game of each team is displayed in the Next Game column.
Verify that Next Game link is clickable and opens Gameday to that actual game in the same tab.
Verify that if there are no Standings results for a set of criteria selected by a user a message appears.
Verify that only PCT column can be sorted.
Verify that ad slots are displaying in the header, 728x90 between each table, 728x90 leaderboard at bottom and 1x3 added to page.
Verify that on Standings pages with minimal content the footer remains pinned at the bottom and does not take up most of the page content.
Verify that "Player" and "Team" nav items are visible, functional and display the respective table results.
Verify that "Hitting" and "Pitching" buttons are visible, functional and display the respective table results.
Verify that the following dropdown exist: "Year", "Season Type", "League", "Year to date", "Positions", "Player Pool" and "Select a split".
Verify that dropdowns operate from left to right: making a selection from a filter on the left changes the available options in the filter to the right of it.
Verify that all dropdown options are functional and filter on the dropdown item selected.
Verify that in the year filter the values range from 2021 - 2005 (descending) and that 2020 is not included in the list.
Verify that LMB (Mexican) will not appear in the list.
Verify that the "Reset Filters" button clears all previously selected filter results.
Verify that clicking on a Player will navigate to that players page.
Verify that clicking on a team name brings the user to the team homepage.
Verify that columns can be sorted (excluding the first two columns).
Verify that threw buttons, Standard, Expanded and Statcast, appears on the same row/line as the dropdowns.
Verify that clicking on the Statcast button navigates to  https://baseballsavant.mlb.com/leaderboard/statcast.
Verify Font displayed on site should be Lato.
Verify that at the bottom the table the user can navigate to more tables using the Prev, 1, 2, 3 or Next buttons.
Verify that if the user is viewing the first page that there is no Prev button.
Verify that if the user is viewing the last page that there is no Next button.
Verify that ads are displaying in the header.
Verify that a user entitled to watch MiLB.TV can access games.
Verify that a user without an MiLB account cannot access games
Verify that after creating a MiLB account the user can access games.
Verify that Back and forward buttons on date picker display the correct dates.
Verify that use can select a specific date within the most recent year and results are correct.
Verify that dropdowns operate from left to right: making a selection from a filter on the left changes the available options within the filter to the right of it.
Verify that class dropdown exists and is populated correctly.
Verify that league dropdown exists and is populated correctly.
Verify that Organization operates independently from other filters to the left.
Verify that the Reset button clears all the filters.
Verify that games are listed based on Upcoming, Live or Completed.
Verify that games in Upcoming have a Preview button with a tool tip associated with the respective game.
Verify that Links work properly with the Additional Information? section.
Verify that clicking a Preview button opens up Gameday for that specific game.
Verify that clicking a Watch button opens the video player for that specific game.
Verify on the video page above the video the names of the two teams are displayed.
Verify that video can play properly without interruption.
Verify user can rewind 15 sec, pause/play, forward 15 sec, mute, raise volume and expand the video.
Verify that MiLB pickers(Class, League, Affiliate) appear on the page.
Verify that there is a Scores title, a date picker, SLO pickers and a reset button.
Verify that as viewport shrinks, pickers move closer together; maintain ~10pm margin between pickers (same as Standings). Wrap to 2nd/3rd line as needed
Verify that on page load picker labels read: Class, League, Affiliate
Verify that the Entire MiLB Scoreboard appears for that day.
Verify that a fan can select a Class, League, and/or a MLB Affiliate.
Verify that Making a selection from the picker(s) accurately displays the content selected.
Verify that selecting All resets the picker.
Verify that references to MLB are replaced with MiLB
Verify that the Schedule tab is removed from the /scores page
Verify that when on a club site the scoreboard only displays the clubs associated with that league
Verify that MiLB player headshots are located at https://img.mlbstatic.com/mlb-photos/image/upload/w_60,q_100/v1/people/generic/headshot/silo/currentÊ
Verify that if no headshot is available then a grey silhouette is displayed.
Verify that clicking/tapping on a Club logo/club name opens that Club's homepage on MiLB.com in the same tab.
Verify that the font of the entire page is Lato.
Verify that the URL updates when the filters are applied to the page.
Verify that removing parameters manually refreshes the content on the page to default.
Verify that a URL that contains specific filters can be copied and applied to another browser.
